title: Algorithm
content: A step-by-step procedure for solving a problem or accomplishing a task.

title: API
content: Application Programming Interface - a set of protocols and tools for building software applications.

title: Binary
content: A number system that uses only two digits: 0 and 1.

title: Cache
content: A hardware or software component that stores data for faster future access.

title: Database
content: An organized collection of structured information or data stored electronically.

title: Introduction to Computer Science
content: Comprehensive guide covering fundamentals of programming, algorithms, and data structures.

title: Data Structures Tutorial
content: Learn about arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs with practical examples.

title: Networking Basics
content: Understanding TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS, and network protocols essential for modern computing.
